channel.title: Military Tech on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Military Tech on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China Is About to Show Off Its New High-Tech Weapons to the World
item.description: On September 3, China will hold a “Victory Day” military parade in Tiananmen Square to celebrate the 80th anniversary of its victory over Japan—and to send the West a message.

item.title: China Is About to Show Off Its New High-Tech Weapons to the World
item.description: On September 3, China will hold a “Victory Day” military parade in Tiananmen Square to celebrate the 80th anniversary of its victory over Japan—and to send the West a message.

item.title: Nuclear Experts Say Mixing AI and Nuclear Weapons Is Inevitable
item.description: Human judgement remains central to the launch of nuclear weapons. But experts say it’s a matter of when, not if, artificial intelligence will get baked into the world’s most dangerous systems.

item.title: Nuclear Experts Say Mixing AI and Nuclear Weapons Is Inevitable
item.description: Human judgement remains central to the launch of nuclear weapons. But experts say it’s a matter of when, not if, artificial intelligence will get baked into the world’s most dangerous systems.
